00046 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 |   PLT_HttpHelper
00048 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00053 class PLT_HttpHelper {
00054 public:
00055     static bool         IsConnectionKeepAlive(NPT_HttpMessage& message);
00056     static bool         IsBodyStreamSeekable(NPT_HttpMessage& message);
00057 
00058     static NPT_Result   ToLog(NPT_LoggerReference logger, int level, NPT_HttpRequest* request);
00059     static NPT_Result   ToLog(NPT_LoggerReference logger, int level, const NPT_HttpRequest& request);
00060     static NPT_Result   ToLog(NPT_LoggerReference logger, int level, NPT_HttpResponse* response);
00061     static NPT_Result   ToLog(NPT_LoggerReference logger, int level, const NPT_HttpResponse& response);
00062 
00063     static NPT_Result   GetContentType(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, NPT_String& type);
00064     static NPT_Result   GetContentLength(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, NPT_LargeSize& len);
00065 
00066     static NPT_Result   GetHost(const NPT_HttpRequest& request, NPT_String& value);
00067     static void         SetHost(NPT_HttpRequest& request, const char* host);
00068     static NPT_Result   GetRange(const NPT_HttpRequest& request, NPT_Position& start, NPT_Position& end);
00069     static void         SetRange(NPT_HttpRequest& request, NPT_Position start, NPT_Position end = (NPT_Position)-1);
00070 
00071     static NPT_Result   GetContentRange(const NPT_HttpResponse& response, NPT_Position& start, NPT_Position& end, NPT_LargeSize& length);
00072     static NPT_Result   SetContentRange(NPT_HttpResponse& response, NPT_Position start, NPT_Position end, NPT_LargeSize length);
00073 
00074     static NPT_Result   SetBody(NPT_HttpMessage& message, NPT_String& body, NPT_HttpEntity** entity = NULL);
00075     static NPT_Result   SetBody(NPT_HttpMessage& message, const char* body, NPT_LargeSize len, NPT_HttpEntity** entity = NULL);
00076     static NPT_Result   SetBody(NPT_HttpMessage& message, NPT_InputStreamReference stream, NPT_HttpEntity** entity = NULL);
00077     static NPT_Result   GetBody(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, NPT_String& body);
00078     static NPT_Result   ParseBody(const NPT_HttpMessage& message, NPT_XmlElementNode*& xml);
00079 
00080     static NPT_Result   Connect(NPT_Socket&      connection,
00081                                 NPT_HttpRequest& request,
00082                                 NPT_Timeout      timeout = NPT_TIMEOUT_INFINITE);
00083     static void         SetBasicAuthorization(NPT_HttpRequest& request, const char* username, const char* password);
00084 };

00086 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 |   PLT_HttpRequestContext
00088 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 class PLT_HttpRequestContext : public NPT_HttpRequestContext {
00095 public:
00096     // constructors and destructor
00097     PLT_HttpRequestContext(const NPT_HttpRequest& request) : 
00098         m_Request(request) {}
00099     PLT_HttpRequestContext(const NPT_HttpRequest& request, const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context) :
00100         NPT_HttpRequestContext(&context.GetLocalAddress(), &context.GetRemoteAddress()),
00101         m_Request(request) {}
00102     virtual ~PLT_HttpRequestContext() {}
00103     
00104     const NPT_HttpRequest& GetRequest() const { return m_Request; }
00105     
00106 private:
00107     const NPT_HttpRequest& m_Request;
00108 };
00109 
00110 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 |   macros
00112 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00113 #if defined(NPT_CONFIG_ENABLE_LOGGING)
00114 #define PLT_LOG_HTTP_MESSAGE_L(_logger, _level, _msg) \
00115     PLT_HttpHelper::ToLog((_logger), (_level), (_msg))
00116 #define PLT_LOG_HTTP_MESSAGE(_level, _msg) \
00117     PLT_HttpHelper::ToLog((_NPT_LocalLogger), (_level), (_msg))
00118 
00119 #else /* NPT_CONFIG_ENABLE_LOGGING */
00120 #define PLT_LOG_HTTP_MESSAGE_L(_logger, _level, _msg)
00121 #define PLT_LOG_HTTP_MESSAGE(_level, _msg)
00122 #endif /* NPT_CONFIG_ENABLE_LOGGING */

00124 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 |   PLT_HttpRequestHandler
00126 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00131 class PLT_HttpRequestHandler : public NPT_HttpRequestHandler
00132 {
00133 public:
00134     PLT_HttpRequestHandler(NPT_HttpRequestHandler* delegate) : 
00135         m_Delegate(delegate) {}
00136     virtual ~PLT_HttpRequestHandler() {}
00137 
00138     // NPT_HttpRequestHandler methods
00139     NPT_Result SetupResponse(NPT_HttpRequest&              request, 
00140                              const NPT_HttpRequestContext& context,
00141                              NPT_HttpResponse&             response) {
00142         return m_Delegate->SetupResponse(request, context, response);
00143     }
00144 
00145 private:
00146     NPT_HttpRequestHandler* m_Delegate;
00147 };
